translations.translation: He will leave them as a barren, level plain
And turn them into a level plain,
and leave the earth a levelled plain
and leave them so smoothly levelled
“Therefore leaving the earth just as an empty plain.”
Then He shall leave it as a level smooth plain."
Then leave it a plain, smooth level
then He will leave them a level hollow
And leave it as an empty plain,
and leave the earth level and bare,
Then He shall leave it a plain, level.
Then He will leave it a level plain.
He will leave them as plains smooth and level;
Then He shall leave it as a level smooth plain.
and leave them a desolate waste,
And leave them desolate waste.
And He will leave the earth a level plain;
[20:106] then He will leave them a level hollow, a flattened [level] surface,
(And leave it) and leave the earth (as an empty plain) without vegetation,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعاً صَفْصَفاً } قالَ الإمامُ زيد بن علي عليهما السّلامُ: معناه مُستوى أملسٌ
 وقال القَاعُ: الأَرضُ المُستويةُ
 والصَّفصَفُ: الذي لا نَبَاتَ فِيهَا

translations.translation:
And the saying of Allaah, {Then he will leave it as a level plain} - Imam Zayd ibn Ali said regarding its meaning: "A level plain."
 The Qa' said: The level earth.


And the Saffasaf: that in which no plant grows.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَيَذَرُهَا } أي: يترك الأرض بعد نسف الحبال { قَاعاً } سطحاً مستوياً { صَفْصَفاً } [طه: 106] ملساء

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
فالضمير في { يذرها } إما للجبال، باعتبار أجزائها السافلة، الباقية بعد النسف، وهي مقارها ومراكزها، وإما للأرض، المدلول عليها بقرينة الحال لأنها الباقية بعد نسف الجبال
 والقاع والقيعة: ما استوى من الأرض وصلُب، وقيل: السهل، وقيل: ما لا نبات فيه
